name: Clown Hunter
description:
Welcome to Clown Hunter, you are a man who lost his family to a group of clowns That call themselves The Knights gung, they aren't very bright but still creepy. In this current version you will be able to roam around a room and fight the clown minions. The bosses are currently on vacation but will be added in the next patch. 

Controls are:

W,A,S,D to move

Left Mouse to shoot

Mouse movement to look around

left control to crouch

left shift to sprint

Buttons 1-4 on top of keyboard to buy from the shop
